name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PinMagic - High-Save Pins, Keyword Generator & Trend Checker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover high-performing pins, generate Pinterest keywords, and check bulk keyword trends with ease using this tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover High-Save Pins: Easily identify pins with the highest saves to refine your content strategy.

New Update: Pinterest Profile Scraper Added.
New Update: Fastest Bulk Pinterest Keyword Trend Checker Added.

Pinterest Keyword Generator: Generate relevant keyword lists to enhance visibility and engagement.

Introducing [new] Pinterest Profile Data: Pin Magic extracts profile data points from top pinners in seconds, unveiling hidden information like monthly profile views, followers, following, and pin count.


Bulk Keyword Trend Checker: Analyze keyword trends in bulk to keep your content up-to-date.

Pin Data Extractor: Access detailed pin information, including likes, repins, and comments.

Top Pin Discovery: Highlight popular pins effortlessly and concentrate on high-performing content.

One-Click Data Extraction: Instantly collect essential data like descriptions, URLs, and engagement stats.

Whether you're a marketer, creator, or Pinterest enthusiast, our extension is crafted to save you time and enhance your Pinterest journey.
